briefTitle: Compassionate Use of Omegaven in Children
officialTitle: Fish Oil Lipid Emulsion for the Treatment of Parenteral-Nutrition-Associated Liver Disease in Infants
summary: This is a single-assignment study to evaluate whether Omegaven (IV fish oil) is effective at treating liver disease in children on long-term IV nutrition.

primaryOutcome.measure: Resolution of Cholestasis for Subjects Who Received Omegaven
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Within the first 3 months of sole Omegaven use
